mapper.sql: id, product_name, product_code, product_type, category_id, brand_id, product_model, material_text, selling_point, detail_description, can_sale, can_show, view_platform, seo_title, seo_desc, seo_key, origin_country_id,origin_province_id, origin_city, is_import, length, width, height, size_text, weight, weight_text, spec_name, color_id, product_color_img, color_display_name, style_id, verbose_info, tips, applicable_people, applicable_scene_text, need_assemble, assemble_tips, can_customized, is_fragile, is_bundling, product_status, reject_reason, on_shelf_time, create_time, approval_time, update_time, is_deleted
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from product
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into product (product_name, product_code, product_type, category_id, brand_id, product_model, material_text, selling_point, detail_description, can_sale, can_show, view_platform, seo_title, mapper.select: select p.id as productId,p.product_name as productName,pp.sell_price as sellPrice from product p inner join product_price pp on pp.product_id=p.id where p.is_deleted = false and p.brand_id = #{brandId} and p.product_type = 2 order by p.id desc

select p.id as productId,p.product_name as productName,pp.sell_price as sellPrice from product p inner join product_price pp on pp.product_id=p.id where p.is_deleted = false and p.brand_id = #{model.brandId} and p.product_type = 2 and p.product_status=1 order by p.id desc

select p.id as productId,p.product_name as productName,pp.sell_price as sellPrice from product p inner join product_designer pd on pd.product_id=p.id inner join product_price pp on pp.product_id=p.id where p.is_deleted = false and pd.designer_id=#{designerId} and p.product_type = 2 order by p.id desc

select p.id as productId,p.product_name as productName,pp.sell_price as sellPrice from product p inner join product_designer pd on pd.product_id=p.id inner join product_price pp on pp.product_id=p.id where p.is_deleted = false and pd.designer_id=#{model.designerId} and p.product_type = 2 and p.product_status=1 order by p.id desc

select ps.product_id as productId,p.product_name as productName,b.brand_cname as brandName from product_serial ps left join product p on p.id=ps.product_id left join brand b on b.id=p.brand_id
left join product_designer pd on pd.product_id=p.id left join designer d on d.id=pd.designer_id
left join product_price pp on pp.product_id=p.id
where p.product_type=2
and p.product_name like concat('%',#{model.productName},'%')
and p.category_id in
#{model.categoryIds[${index}]}
and p.product_code like concat('%',#{model.productCode},'%')
and b.brand_cname like concat('%',#{model.brandName},'%')
and p.product_status = #{model.productStatus}
GROUP BY ps.product_id having 1=1
and GROUP_CONCAT(d.designer_name) concat('%',#{model.designerName},'%')
and MIN(pp.sell_price) >= #{model.beginSellPrice}
and MAX(pp.sell_price) <= #{model.endSellPrice}
order by p.create_time desc

select psr.product_id as productId,psr.sub_product_id as subProductId,p.product_name as productName,p.spec_name as specName,p.product_code as productCode, pp.sell_price as sellPrice,ps.total_sold_qty as totalSoldQty,p.product_status as productStatus,p.create_time as createTime from product_serial psr inner join product p on psr.sub_product_id=p.id left join product_price pp on pp.product_id=p.id left join product_summary ps on ps.product_id=p.id where p.is_deleted = false and p.product_type = 1 and psr.product_id in
#{productId}

select product.id,product_image.img_url,product.product_name,product_price.sell_price from product join product_short_list_in_topic on product.id=product_short_list_in_topic.product_id join product_price on product.id=product_price.product_id left join product_image on product.id=product_image.product_id left join product_summary on product.id=product_summary.total_sold_qty where product.product_status=1 and product.is_deleted=0 and product_short_list_in_topic.is_deleted=0 and (product_image.id is null or (product_image.is_deleted=0 and product_image.is_primary=0)) and product_short_list_in_topic.short_list_in_topic=1 and product_short_list_in_topic.topic_id=#{model.topicId} order by ${model.orderColumn} ${model.OrderType}

select product.id,product_image.img_url,product.product_name,product_price.sell_price from product join product_short_list_in_topic on product.id=product_short_list_in_topic.product_id join product_price on product.id=product_price.product_id left join product_image on product.id=product_image.product_id where product.product_status=1 and product.is_deleted=0 and product_short_list_in_topic.is_deleted=0 and (product_image.id is null or (product_image.is_deleted=0 and product_image.is_primary=0)) and product_short_list_in_topic.short_list_in_topic=1 and product_short_list_in_topic.topic_id=#{topicId}
